Package com.brightcove.player.mediacontroller

Class BrightcovePreviewSeekBar

java.lang.Object
android.view.View
android.widget.ProgressBar
android.widget.AbsSeekBar
android.widget.SeekBar
com.brightcove.player.mediacontroller.BrightcoveSeekBar
com.brightcove.player.mediacontroller.BrightcovePreviewSeekBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, PreviewThumbnailView
public class BrightcovePreviewSeekBar extends BrightcoveSeekBar implements PreviewThumbnailView

The default PreviewThumbnailView in the Thumbnail plugin. It is also the default BrightcoveSeekBar used in the BrightcoveMediaController when ThumbnailComponent.setupPreviewThumbnailController() is called.
